the Sixers fought off a rally by the Bulls and opened a 19-point lead. Philadelphia has won four of its last six. "This game will give us a little bit more confidence," Allen Iverson said. It gives us confidence because if we can beat the world champions, there shouldn't be any reason why we shouldn't feel we can beat every team we play against. Some nights we're going to have off nights shooting the ball but if we play defense, we'll be in every game. Scottie Pippen scored 22 points-- two in the second half-- and Michael Jordan added 20 for the Bulls, who were coming off a convincing home win over Seattle and lost for the first time in three games since Scottie Pippen

The CEO of Unequal Technology addressed the reasoning behind choosing Michael Vick as the company's spokesman despite his checkered past. " Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person." The crimes he committed were of unspeakably terrible, but given a second-chance, Michael Vick has made the most of his opportunity. in with "Idol" alongside Simon Cowell and the adorably kooky Paula Abdul , will share the judges panel with Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler - high-profile newcomers being counted on to return some much-needed buzz to the aging franchise. I think they've really added a different kind of zest and a freshness to it, Michael Jackson said in a recent conference call. the six years during which he ran the Defense Department for President Bush - particularly because nearly two-thirds of the book deal with that relatively brief period in the author's life. But, as Donald Rumsfeld writes, he's never much of a handwringer, I don't spend a lot of time in recriminations, looking back or second-guessing decisions made in real time with imperfect information by myself or others. As seems typical of so much here, that's partially true; the author has no taste for self-criticism or second-guessing himself. Masterful bureaucratic survivor that he was until he ran out of room to maneuver
